org.gcn.plinguacore.simulator

Class DecoratorSimulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gcn.plinguacore.simulator.DecoratorSimulator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ISimulator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlternativeStepsSupportedSimulator, StepBackSupportedSimulator

    public abstract class DecoratorSimulator
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISimulator
    This class gives support for all common functionality in simulator decorators, according to Decorator pattern
    Author:
    Research Group on Natural Computing (http://www.gcn.us.es)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      DecoratorSimulator(ISimulator decorated)
      Creates a new instance based on a decorated instance
